Title: Illusion Mermaid Prom Dress with Sequins

----

Sku: C202

----

Price:

Saleprice:

Sizes: 10, 14, 12, 6, 4, 8

----

Colors: cham-mauve

Category: formal-gowns

Featured-image: C202-champagne-illusion-mermaid-prom-dress-with-sequins_p.jpg

----

Description: Rhinestones and sequins swirl into paisley designs that flow over the length of the gown. The sheer fabric creates an illusion of a completely sheer gown. An oval cutout on the back adds to the appeal of the gown. The mermaid flare is ruffled tulle and it sweeps the floor with an elegant train.
